feed.title: Damian Doan
feed.subtitle: am a fourth-year student seeking a summer 2023 internship. With strong skills in web development (ReactJS, NodeJS, Tailwind CSS) and mobile app development (Android, Flutter), I have fundamental knowledge in PHP and have built and deployed a container of my own website on Google Cloud Platform. I am also proficient in Figma for designing interfaces. I am passionate and driven to learn and contribute to an organization's growth in web development.
